summary: A coat of arms is a special design, often on a shield, that represents a person, family, or organization. It's like a unique badge that shows who they are. These designs can also be found on clothes like surcoats and tabards. The full set includes the shield, side supporters, a crest on top, and sometimes a motto. People have been collecting and showing these coats of arms for centuries, helping to trace family history and nobility.
title: Coat of arms
